messages.message:
@Victor Zeng The changes made in this (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/71309) PR are causing api-server to fail to run with the below error:
```mkdir -p /home/owner/instabase/webserver/api-server/tmp/hotconfig && touch /home/owner/instabase/webserver/api-server/tmp/hotconfig/base-hot-config.yml
CONFIG_NAME=docker-local \
python /home/owner/instabase/webserver/api-server/../../shared-utils/build-utils/stack-local/get-env-local.py \
/home/owner/instabase/webserver/api-server/deployment/env/deployment-config.json \
/home/owner/instabase/webserver/api-server/../../shared-utils/build-utils/shared/env-local.json /home/owner/instabase/webserver/api-server/../../shared-utils/build-utils/shared/env-local-secrets.json /home/owner/instabase/webserver/api-server/../../shared-utils/build-utils/shared/env-local-crafting.json /home/owner/instabase/webserver/api-server/../../shared-utils/build-utils/shared/env-local-feature-flags.json /home/owner/instabase/webserver/api-server/../../shared-utils/build-utils/shared/env-local-overrides.json > /home/owner/instabase/webserver/api-server/tmp/docker_env_local.list
docker run  -v /home/owner/instabase/webserver/api-server/tmp/hotconfig:/config \
--name instabase-api-server --env-file /home/owner/instabase/webserver/api-server/tmp/docker_env_local.list \
--rm -p 5555:5555 -i instabase/api-server
start.sh: line 75: exec: -m: invalid option
exec: usage: exec [-cl] [-a name] [command [argument ...]] [redirection ...]
make: *** [Makefile:309: run-docker] Error 2
make: Leaving directory '/home/owner/instabase/webserver/api-server'```
This is happening because of the final command to run coming out to either be `python -m debugpy --listen 0.0.0.0:5678 -m gunicorn ...` or `-m gunicorn ...` because of the -m always being there.
Here's PR to attempt to fix it - https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/71361
Can you add the -m to line 16 before merging?
It needs a second -m at the end
Okay, I'll add it and test it out
